paper: Reinforcement Learning in Different Phases of Quantum Control
goal: load a nonintegrable interacting quantum system into a desired target state

construct.title: Reinforcement Learning in Different Phases of Quantum Control
construct.author: Bukov, Marin and Day, Alexandre G. R. and Sels, Dries and Weinberg, Phillip and Polkovnikov, Anatoli and Mehta, Pankaj

Reinforcement learning.description: a modified version of Watkins online, off-policy Q-learning algorithm with linear function approximation and eligibility traces

single-qubit manipulation.purpose(before): to benchmark the application of RL to physics problems
purpose: benchmark the protocol obtained by RL agent.
reveal an important novel perspective on the complexity of quantum-state manipulation.

fidelity.description: the fidelity between the target state |ψ_*⟩ and the state |ψ(T)⟩ at the end of the protocol T

explanation.q(T) = 0: 表明所有的控制协议都产生相同的非保真度值，即所有协议都是完全简并的，具有完全相同的效果。在这种情况下，系统的非保真度景观可能只有一个全局最低点，显示出非常平坦和均匀的特性。
explanation.q(T) = 1: 表示控制协议之间完全不相关，每个协议都导致独特的非保真度值，反映出非常崎岖和多峰的非保真度景观。
explanation.0 < q(T) < 1: 这个范围表明存在一定程度的相关性和多样性。不是所有的协议都具有相同的非保真度，意味着非保真度景观中存在多个局部极小值。这些局部极小值可能是非简并的，显示出系统从一个有多个等效最优解的阶段（简并），转变为一个有多个差异性较大的局部最优解的阶段（非简并）。

performance metric.To study the correlations between the in: correlator: $q(T)=\frac{1}{16 N_T} \sum_{j=1}^{N_T} \overline{\left\{h_x(j \delta t)-\overline{h_x}(j \delta t)\right\}^2}$(the behavior of the correlator q(T) show in Fig. 1)

T > T_QSL.name: Controllable phase III
explanation(说明): one can construct infinitely many protocols which prepare the target state with unit fidelity, and the problem is in the controllable phase III
In this phase, there is a proliferation of exactly degenerate, uncorrelated global infidelity minima corresponding to protocols of unit fidelity, and the optimization task is easy.
phenomenon: unit fidelity(保真度为单位值) -> to the target state(infinitely many protocols(无穷多的协议))
unit fidelity(保真度为单位值) -> exactly degenerate(精确简并) optimization(protocol)
q(T) = 1 -> uncorrelated global infidelity minima(不相关的全局不忠实最小值)

T = T_QSL.state: transition to a correlated phase II
phenomenon: order parameter q(T) exhibits a non-analyticit(不连续或不光滑)
the system undergoes a continuous phase transition to a correlated phase II
(1). the finite value of the order parameter 0 < q(T) < 1
no longer exists a protocol to prepare the target state with unit fidelity

Thisprotocol has a remarkable feature: Without any prior knowledge about the intermediate quantum state or its Bloch sphererepresentation, the model-free RL agent discovers that it isadvantageous to first bring the state to the equator-which is ageodesic and then effectively turns off the control fieldh,(t) to enable the fastest possible precession about the z axis[71].
explanation: the degenerate minima of the infidelity landscape recede to form a correlated landscape with many nondegenerate local minima[多个简并（即性能相等）的全局最优解开始消失，非保真度景观中的极小值变得不再简并, 这些极小值退化为非兼并的局部极小值] -> (1)
it is physically impossible to reach the target state while obeying all constraints
the problem has a unique solution
